Reviews.Title: “A romantic and peaceful place 2 minutes far from Rialto bridge”
Reviews.Author: mathilde_camus
Reviews.Content: spent 3 days hotel stop honey moon parked car motorbikes trailer parking lot boat arrive venise impression beautiful romantic sun entering streets canals beauty labyrinth easy anyway found 30 minutes walk arrived hotel nearest regular boat grand canal value gondola hotel placed little church bar terrace little bridge cute pictures visitors welcome friendly helpful person speaking fluently italian english french pink direct access breakfast nice stylish fancy whirlpool shower bed bed middle ceiling gorgeous decorations getting venise peaceful 1000pm nightlife party venise definitely found teeny tiny bar street 500m hotel direction rialto bridge offering delicious cocktails 200am cold geneva otherwise youll hotels bars breakfast balcony offering charming view canal bridge hotel 1 table fitting balcony lasts breakfast recommend hotel venise definitely recommend expensive regards competition sometimes crazy recommend stay 34 days venise except love basilicas churches visit 140 churches venise count worth visit else world smells mystery baroque charm

Reviews.Title: “Lovely and Romantic”

Reviews.Content: fantastic hotel staff time arrived pampered treated stars junior suite stayed 6 truly venetian style red covered bed light bed floor ages preserved overlooking canal site facilities wifi excellent jacuzzi fantastic bathroom huge accessible waterbus 1 san stae stop third stop museum left bridge left pass 4 bridges straight arrive square boom hotel hand easy people heavy luggage difficult carry walk 57 minutes close loved
